messeage.msg7: Pause is allowed only when it is playing

dialog.content:
Are you sure you want to clear all scores in the current work area? 
Unsaved changes will be lost.
dialog.content2:
Are you sure you want to leave the score editing page? 
Unsaved changes will be lost.
dialog.negativeText: If I don't clear, I'll save it first
dialog.negativeText2: I'll save it first if I don't leave
dialog.title: A warm tip from the developer ‚≠ê

tips.afer_add_column: Insert a new column after the current highlighted column
tips.clear_sheet: Clear the score of the current workspace
tips.copy_now_to_end: Copy a copy to the end of the current highlighted column
tips.copy_now_to_head: Copy a copy to the beginning of the current highlighted column
tips.copy_now_to_next: Copy a copy of the current highlighted column to the next column
tips.copy_now_to_pre: Copy a copy of the current highlighted column to the previous column
tips.play_now_column: The highlighted column is in the game and press
tips.select_in_music: Select songs from the song list
tips.tip1: The long press interval needs to be less than the column and wait for the delay, and it has been automatically adjusted (currently)
tips.tip6: The long press interval needs to be less than the waiting interval, and the waiting delay after the column has been automatically increased (currently)
tips.tip7: The waiting delay after column cannot be less than 10, and has been automatically adjusted (new globally)
tips.tip8: The waiting delay after long pressing is less than the column, 10ms, has been automatically adjusted (new globally)

title.change_send_key_in_game: Send keys to the game via column
title.sheet_area_color: Alternating colors in the spectrum area

setting.head_text: The piano map takes effect for this operation. Restarting the software requires reset. If you do not adapt, please adapt as soon as possible.
setting.patterns3: Adapt to it as soon as possible
setting.repeat: There are duplicate shortcut key values, please check the configuration.

shortcutKeys.head_text: The shortcut keys are effective for this operation. Restarting the software requires reset. If you do not adapt, please adapt as soon as possible.
shortcutKeys.patterns3: Adapt to it as soon as possible
